Html:
I am trying to install this project. I followed all the steps and downloaded all the requirments, but whenever I try to open Oxite.sln, I get an error for the project OxiteSite.csproj.
The error is 
Project OxiteSite.csproj cannont be opened.
The project is not supported by this installation.
I tried to open it with Visual Web Developer 2008 Express Edition, Visual Studio 2005 and Visual Studio 2008 (Professional Edition), all reported same error.

Any idea?

Thanks
That error only happens when MVC isn't installed.  Are you sure it was successful?
